org.rhwlab.utils
Class EUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.rhwlab.utils.EUtils
public class EUtils
extends java.lang.Object

A class to hold static simple utility functions.
At this point, the two version of makePaddedInt are the only things in use.

Version:
1.0 January 18, 2005
Author:
biowolp
